function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on upper-room UVGI as the sole intervention for inhibiting COVID-19 transmission in buildings.","Impact":"Potential for incomplete inactivation of virus in other areas of the building, leading to continued spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Combining UVGI with other effective interventions such as ventilation and filtration to ensure comprehensive coverage of the building.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, and UV-C light fixtures for whole-room disinfection.","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially those in poorly ventilated or crowded spaces.","Owner":"Building managers, health and safety officials, and facilities management teams."}]}
